title: al-Juzʾ al-awwal[-al-juzʾ al-thānī] min Fatḥ al-jawād bi-sharḥ al-Irshād / li-Shaykh Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī al-Makkī. Wa-bi-al-hāmish Ḥāshiyat Fatḥ al-jawād li-sharḥ al-Irshād / lil-ʻallāmah Ibn Ḥajar al-madhkūr.
author: Ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, approximately 1503-approximately 1566.
